alert.note: Alert for Oregon; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 10:57PM CST until March 06 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Shannon County in south central Missouri... Oregon County in south central Missouri... * Until 1130 PM CST. * At 1057 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles east of Eminence to near Winona to near Birch Tree to 9 miles west of Alton to 9 miles west of Thayer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grand Gulf State Park... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Thayer... Winona... Alton... Birch Tree... Eminence... Koshkonong... Thomasville... Myrtle... Wilderness... Couch... Rover... West Eminence... Greer... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Missouri.
